name: Kar War
description: You run a weaponized vehicle inside an arena where you have to deal with continuously spawning rogue vehicles which attack you and try to damage your "Kar". You can pick 3shots and 5shots, and rampage through the attackers, also destroy them. You also get health pickups from time to time to fix some of the damage your Kar has dealt with.  Another cool friendly Kar pickup is there which brings a friendly Kar into the arena for some time to help you maximize the destruction. You lose when your Kar gets completely damaged and as a score, you are shown how many attacker vehicles you destroyed throughout the gameplay.
